update t_maintain_info set subject = #{subject,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, station_id = #{stationId,jdbcType=BIGINT}, present_user_id = #{presentUserId,jdbcType=BIGINT}, presenter = #{presenter,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, type = #{type,jdbcType=INTEGER}, present_date = #{presentDate,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP}, start_date = #{startDate,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP}, end_date = #{endDate,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP}, info_detail = #{infoDetail,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, status = #{status,jdbcType=INTEGER}, approve_user_id = #{approveUserId,jdbcType=BIGINT}, approver = #{approver,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, create_dttm = #{createDttm,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP}, update_dttm = #{updateDttm,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP} where id = #{id,jdbcType=BIGINT}
mapper.select:
select distinct t1.realname from t_maintain_info t,t_user t1 where 1 = 1 and t.present_user_id = t1.user_id
and t.station_id = #{stationId,jdbcType=BIGINT}
